H3.text: who won the 2017 women 's wimbledon final. Garbiñe Muguruza

A4.text: Garbiñe Muguruza defeated Venus Williams in the final, 7–5, 6–0 to win the ladies' singles tennis title at the 2017 Wimbledon Championships.

A5.text: Serena Williams was the two-time reigning champion, but did not participate due to pregnancy.
